nodes.text: The Alou Belt was an asteroid belt that occupied the second orbital position around the yellow star Baralou within the Baralou system of the Outer Rim Territories' Varada sector.

The Alou Belt was first mentioned in Planets of the Galaxy, Volume One, a 1991 sourcebook for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Baralou system, and therefore the Alou Belt, in grid square H-20.
